content: Odyl is an incredible being. She's brilliant, thoughtful, and passionate about her work. Her dedication to her research and her desire to understand the universe are truly inspiring. But beyond that, there's just something about her that draws me in. Maybe it's her sense of humor, or her kindness, or her fierce independence. Whatever it is, I'm so grateful to have her in my life. Even when we were at odds with each other, there was always a certain chemistry between us. And now that we're together, it feels like everything in the universe is in perfect alignment. I can't imagine my life without her.
